DEMO_050_MSG_010:
̂The world ahead of you, is the reality you've
been deprived of, for so long...
DEMO_050_MSG_020:
̂I wish I had more time to explain everything to you...
I'm sure this is all very sudden.
DEMO_050_MSG_030: ̂This device on your head... it's called a Reactor. It will help guide you through this new, foreign world.
DEMO_050_MSG_040:
̂Soon enough, ȁ... you'll see the truth for yourself.
ā
DEMO_050_MSG_050: ̂Once you've remembered everything... who you really are... we'll be able to fulfill that promise of ours... !
